text: Esmonts is a village of the district Glâne in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2006, Vuarmarens incorporated the formerly independent municipality of Esmonts and on 1 January 2012, it has been with Vuarmarens merged to form Ursy.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg Category:Villages in Fribourg
title: Esmonts
